title: Video: Milwalkie – Wash Yourself
content:
Having been in previous musical outfits before, it appears that Berlin’s Milwalkie have settled upon a shape that they’re truly comfortable to inhabit.

Wash Yourself, the first single taken from their forthcoming sophomore record, is a synth driven dream pop gem, drawing from the likes of Twin Shadow and Washed Out to imagine a track so perfectly rounded that it’s impossible to not view it as their finest work to date. Check out the beautifully shot video directed by Rocco Lacitignola below and keep up with Milwalkie via their Facebook.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
